Title: Silverlight NumericUpDown with nullable types support
Description: Silverlight NumericUpDown control with support for nullable data types (int/int?/double/double?....).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Silverlight NumericUpDown control with support for nullable data types (int/int?/double/double?....).

First public release 0.1:

- Support for nullable numeric data types (int?, double?, float?, ....)
- Added fixes to some minor bugs found in standard numericUpDown (handling big (positive and negative) values)

Probably there are still some bugs in my code. With your help I will try to correct them... So - feedback and any suggestions are welcome.

Ilektrik
